body: r_r bends over the body of {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} love, wailing {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} despair into m_c's fur. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/sit/sits} vigil next to the body, wishing {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} could wake from this nightmare.

All the things they'll never do together, the places r_r wanted to show {PRONOUN/r_r/object}, the life they could have lived by each other's sides, all wiped away in an instant.

body: r_r had thought that {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} would never feel alone again after m_c entered {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} life. Now, staring at m_c's lifeless body, r_r doesn't know what {PRONOUN/r_r/subject}'ll do, how {PRONOUN/r_r/subject}'ll ever go on from here.

r_r's Clanmates make sure to spend extra time with {PRONOUN/r_r/object} in the days since m_c's death, sharing their fresh-kill and tongues. Maybe {PRONOUN/r_r/subject}{VERB/r_r/'re/'s} not as alone as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} always thought {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/were/was}.

body: When m_c's body is returned to camp, r_r can't help but break down in caterwauls. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/press/presses} {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} muzzle into m_c's icy pelt, shivering with grief.

body: r_r wants to tear the world apart. Looking down at m_c's lifeless body, r_r digs {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} claws into the ground and grits {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} teeth, vowing to {PRONOUN/r_r/self} to avenge {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} lost love in any way possible.
